Introduction
This topic contains instructions for handling funds in PFOP accounts, including
types of PFOP accounts
award action on the two types of PFOP accounts
use of funds for necessary comforts and desires by VAMCs and non-VA hospitals
, and
payment of funds in a PFOP account as accrued benefits upon the death of a Veteran
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F - Awards Specific to Institutionalized, Incompetent Veterans
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F
